messages.content:
Please separate the following text into sentences:

This COMMON HANGAR LEASE AGREEMENT ("Lease"), made as of the Effective Date between the City of McKinney, a Texas home-rule municipality ("Landlord") and Wonder Woman Financial Services ("Tenant").
In consideration of$ 1600.00 per month hangar rent and office rent of$ 750.00 , payable by the 1st of the month ("Base Rent") and other applicable fees described herein, Landlord leases to Tenant, the non-exclusive use of Hangar and Office Suite (#209,#211) , consisting of 361 square feet, described herein, located on the McKinney First Airport(the"Airport"),in its present condition, beginning on February1,2018 (the "Effective Date") and continuing for a term of _3_ [(month(s)/_years(s)_] (the "Lease Term"), to store an airworthy aircraft identified as:
TYPE OF AIRCRAFT: Citation Excel TAIL NO: N47TZ
(the "Aircraft"), and for the Permitted Uses described herein.
The Airport Minimum Standards Rules and Regulations, located in the McKinney City Code, Chapter 30 "Aviation," ("Rules and Regulations") all applicable federal, state or local agreements, laws, rules, regulations, and grant assurances ("Laws"), all as may be amended from time to time, are incorporated herein and made a part of this Lease.

Here are the sentences:

This COMMON HANGAR LEASE AGREEMENT ("Lease"), made as of the Effective Date between the City of McKinney, a Texas home-rule municipality ("Landlord") and Wonder Woman Financial Services ("Tenant").

In consideration of$ 1600.00 per month hangar rent and office rent of$ 750.00 , payable by the 1st of the month ("Base Rent") and other applicable fees described herein, Landlord leases to Tenant, the non-exclusive use of Hangar and Office Suite (#209,#211) , consisting of 361 square feet, described herein, located on the McKinney First Airport(the"Airport"),in its present condition, beginning on February1,2018 (the "Effective Date") and continuing for a term of _3_ [(month(s)/_years(s)_] (the "Lease Term"), to store an airworthy aircraft identified as:

TYPE OF AIRCRAFT: Citation Excel TAIL NO: N47TZ
(the "Aircraft"), and for the Permitted Uses described herein.   

The Airport Minimum Standards Rules and Regulations, located in the McKinney City Code, Chapter 30 "Aviation," ("Rules and Regulations") all applicable federal, state or local agreements, laws, rules, regulations, and grant assurances ("Laws"), all as may be amended from time to time, are incorporated herein and made a part of this Lease.

Please separate the following text into numbered sentences:

THIS LEASE AGREEMENT hereinafter known as the "Lease" is made and entered into this 3rd day of August, 2022, by and between the Landlord known as Mr. John Smith with a mailing address 123 Main St., in the City of Centerville, State of Alabama hereinafter known as the "Landlord" and the Tenant(s) known as Richard Johnson, Jr. hereinafter known as the "Tenant(s)" for and in consideration of the covenants and obligations contained herein and other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which is hereby acknowledged, the parties hereby agree as follows:

PROPERTY. Landlord owns property and improvements located at 456 Center St, City of Cityville, State of Alabamba (hereinafter referred to as the "Property"). Landlord desires to lease the Property to Tenant upon the terms and conditions contained herein. Tenant desires to lease the Property from Landlord upon the terms and conditions contained herein.

1. THIS LEASE AGREEMENT hereinafter known as the "Lease" is made and entered into this 3rd day of August, 2022, by and between the Landlord known as Mr. John Smith with a mailing address 123 Main St., in the City of Centerville, State of Alabama hereinafter known as the "Landlord" and the Tenant(s) known as Richard Johnson, Jr. hereinafter known as the "Tenant(s)" for and in consideration of the covenants and obligations contained herein and other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which is hereby acknowledged, the parties hereby agree as follows:

2. PROPERTY. Landlord owns property and improvements located at 456 Center St, City of Cityville, State of Alabamba (hereinafter referred to as the "Property"). Landlord desires to lease the Property to Tenant upon the terms and conditions contained herein. Tenant desires to lease the Property from Landlord upon the terms and conditions contained herein.

Please separate the following text into numbered sentences:

Tenant understands that the Premises are located in a common use hangar, portions of which may be leased by Landlord to additional tenants. Tenant shall havelhe non-exclusive use of the shared space that is for common use by other tenants. The Premises shall be used and occupied by Tenant only for the storage of an airworthy aircraft (the "Permitted Use"). Tenant shall occupy and use the Premises only for the permitted Use, and shall comply with all Laws relating to the use and condition oitne premises. Any use of the Premises other than for the Permitted Use is prohibited without Landlord's prior written consent.
Tenant agrees that no aircraft, vehicle or equipment will be left unattended outside the Premises or within any common area of the Airport, including without limitation the safety areas, the parking lots and ramps immediately adjacent to the Premises or Airport operating areas. Tenant shall not engage in any activities that interfere with the free access and passage of others to portions of the Premises that are for the common use by and benefit of other tenants or Airport users or employees. The Premises shall not be used for any purpose or activity that (i) constitutes a violation of any Laws; (ii) in Landlord's opinion, creates or would create a nuisance or waste or unreasonably disturb, annoy or interfere with other tenants or users of the Airport; or (iii) increases insurance costs for Landlord. Tenant shall not create any alterations, additions or improvements to the Premises, without the prior written consent of Landlord.

1. Tenant understands that the Premises are located in a common use hangar, portions of which may be leased by Landlord to additional tenants. Tenant shall havelhe non-exclusive use of the shared space that is for common use by other tenants. 

2. The Premises shall be used and occupied by Tenant only for the storage of an airworthy aircraft (the "Permitted Use"). 

3. Tenant shall occupy and use the Premises only for the permitted Use, and shall comply with all Laws relating to the use and condition oitne premises. Any use of the Premises other than for the Permitted Use is prohibited without Landlord's prior written consent.

4. Tenant agrees that no aircraft, vehicle or equipment will be left unattended outside the Premises or within any common area of the Airport, including without limitation the safety areas, the parking lots and ramps immediately adjacent to the Premises or Airport operating areas.

5. Tenant shall not engage in any activities that interfere with the free access and passage of others to portions of the Premises that are for the common use by and benefit of other tenants or Airport users or employees. 

6. The Premises shall not be used for any purpose or activity that (i) constitutes a violation of any Laws; (ii) in Landlord's opinion, creates or would create a nuisance or waste or unreasonably disturb, annoy or interfere with other tenants or users of the Airport; or (iii) increases insurance costs for Landlord.

7. Tenant shall not create any alterations, additions or improvements to the Premises, without the prior written consent of Landlord.
